Pricing Section with Bundles.Layout: Two-column layout with each column representing a different bundle option: Basic and Pro.
Pricing Section with Bundles.Design: Clean and structured with clear distinctions between the bundle options. Highlighted elements such as 'Best value' badge and strikethrough original prices enhance the perceived value.

Key Elements.Section Header: Centered header with a brief introduction and description.
Key Elements.Bundle Options: Two distinct bundles with different features and pricing.
Key Elements.Price Display: Prominent display of current and original prices.
Key Elements.Feature List: Bulleted list of features included in each bundle, accompanied by checkmark icons.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Buttons: Buttons to purchase each bundle, clearly labeled and easily accessible.

Pricing Section with Bundles.Use Cases: Ideal for product or service offerings where multiple pricing tiers or package options are available, such as software subscriptions, educational courses, or membership plans.
